author: thorsten
msg: removed the comments for the locationmap. removed map:ressources because they are not needed anymore. Added the same configuration for the linkrewritting like we have in the main sitemap.xmap.

author: bruno
msg: do not add onchange if user defined its own onchange, this allows to have custom onchange behaviour

msg: there are instance that module class need to access module classloders , so I added a method to set/get classloader to moduleDecription

author: thorsten
